parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Force helicopter landing. Landing mode may be: 

* "LAND" (complete stop)
* "GET IN" (hovering very low, for another unit to get in)
* "GET OUT" (hovering low,for another unit to get out)
* "NONE" (cancel a landing) ''Available since ArmA 2 57463 build.''
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> helicopter '''land''' mode </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> helicopter: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mode: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_cobraOne '''land''' "LAND"</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[landAt]], [[allAirports]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 4, 2006 - 10:56
<dt class="note">[[User:Hardrock|hardrock]]<dd class="note">''Notes from before the conversion:''

Helos will land at the nearest "H" or "Invisible H", if there is one around (within 500m in ArmA).


<dd class="notedate">
<dt class="note">[[User:=\SNKMAN/=|=\SNKMAN/=]]
<dd class="note">To make a helicopter LAND correctly and not hovering over the landing position use [[unitReady]] to check if the helicopter already has reached his destination.
You can fix a landing bug by using a short delay bevore checking the [[unitReady]] command.

<ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>
_helicopter move (getPos _destination);

sleep 3;

while { ( (alive _helicopter) && !(unitReady _helicopter) ) } do
{
       sleep 1;
};

if (alive _helicopter) then
{
       _helicopter land "LAND";
};
</inner><close></pre></close></ext>


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>

<h3 style="display:none">Bottom Section</h3>
